title: color map
description: 3D Tiles style color map to map a key value to a Color.

key.description: A style expression that evaluates to the key used to look up the color in the map.

values.description: A dictionary object of key/value pairs where the key is an expression, and the value is a expression evaluating to a Color.

defaultColor.description: The default color if the key is not found in the map.
